56723.name: Holographic Strain
56723.description: The hologram's presence causes all foes within range to take damage every 3 seconds.

56873.name: Time Sink

facts.description: Skills and actions are slower.

56873.description: Shatter. Destroy all your clones, dazing and slowing their targets.

56880.name: Pitfall

facts.description: Damage and condition damage taken are increased; stacks intensity.

56880.description: Unleash your pitfall on the area, knocking down foes and delivering constant damage over time.

56883.name: Sunspot

facts.description: Enveloped in a fiery shield that burns foes, grants might each time you are struck (1-second cooldown per attacker).

56883.description: Gain a fire aura and damage nearby foes.

56898.name: Thousand Needles

facts.description: Unable to move; stacks duration.
Deals damage every second; decreases healing effectiveness by 33%; damage stacks intensity.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

56898.description: Unleash a hail of needles that immobilizes enemies on impact and poisons the ground, inflicting conditions over time.

56916.name: Dark Pursuit
56916.description: Shadowstep to the foe marked by Dark Path.

56920.name: Function Gyro
56920.description:
Create a lightning field at the specified point. Then summon gyros to finish foes and revive allies within the field. The recharge of this skill is increased for each gyro created beyond the first.
Interrupted gyros are destroyed.

56921.name: Function Gyro
56921.description:
Create a lightning field at your location. Then summon gyros to finish foes and revive allies within the field. The recharge of this skill is increased for each gyro created beyond the first.
Interrupted gyros are destroyed.

56925.name: Split Second
56925.description:
Shatter. Destroy all your clones, damaging nearby foes. Strikes again after a delay.
Shatter traits only affect the first strike of this skill.

56928.name: Rewinder

facts.description: Damage received on skill activation; stacks intensity.

56928.description: Shatter. Destroy all your clones, confusing nearby foes and recharging this skill for each clone shattered.

traited_facts.description: Endurance regeneration increased by 50%; stacks duration.
Endurance regeneration increased by 50%; stacks duration.

Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

56930.name: Split Second
56930.description:
Shatter. Destroy all your clones, damaging nearby foes. Strikes again after a delay.
Shatter traits only affect the first strike of this skill.

57012.name: Eruption

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.
Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.

57012.description: Shake the ground until it erupts and damages foes.

57025.name: Gnawed
57025.description: Your struggles to escape are in vain.

57593.name: Frostbite Aura
57593.description: Icebrood construct pulses a volatile aura that deals damage every 3 seconds to all foes within a range of 2,000.

57690.name: Ice Shatter
57690.description: The icebrood construct shatters a piece of its core, creating ice platforms that shoot multiple ice projectiles. Once the projectiles stop, the platform becomes safe to stand on.

58000.name: Globolla Marble
58000.description: Creates a launch orb if it completes its path. Refreshes Nova Launch when bouncing on party members. Explodes when contacting the ground.

58073.description: Magic orbs erupt from the Vale Guardian, releasing energy and damaging targets in a small area around their impact point.

58090.name: Med Blaster
58090.description: Restore health to allies with several pulses of healing energy. Heals more for each boon on the ally.

58104.name: Infusion Bomb

facts.description: Movement speed increased by 33%; stacks duration.
Endurance regeneration increased by 50%; stacks duration.
Gain health every second; stacks duration.

58104.description: Throw a bomb that grants boons to nearby allies when it explodes.

58132.name: Hammer Spin
58132.description: The Claw spins, launching nearby targets. Redirects arrows fired by the Voice, leaving behind damaging magic fields.

58174.name: Vengeful Aura
58174.description: The Fallen pulse a volatile aura that deals damage to all foes every 3 seconds.

58184.name: Ice Shock Wave
58184.description: The icebrood construct slams its arm down, doing damage and creating a shock wave that knocks enemies down. The shock wave can be jumped.

58199.name: Torrent of Ice
58199.description: Rains ice blocks over a large area, encasing enemies hit in ice.

58219.name: Frostbite Aura
58219.description: Icebrood construct pulses a volatile aura that deals damage every 3 seconds to all foes within a range of 2,000.

58230.name: Ice Shock Wave
58230.description: The icebrood construct slams its arm down, doing damage and creating a shock wave that knocks enemies down. The shock wave can be jumped.

58262.name: Ghostly Grasp
58262.description: The Voice fires an arrow that splits and tracks enemies, creating immobilizing traps at each point of impact.

58458.name: Escape
58458.description: The Voice leaps backward, leaving behind a trap that immobilizes enemies.

58497.name: Hammer Lunge
58497.description: The Claw swings its hammer three times, dealing increasing damage with each strike. Targets hit by the final strike are knocked down.

58501.name: Ice Flail
58501.description: The icebrood construct swings its arm, doing damage and knocking enemies down. Breaks free any Bound Ice Elementals that are hit.

58518.name: Seismic Crush
58518.description: The icebrood construct slams its arm down, doing damage and creating a shock wave that knocks enemies down. Ice shards rain down over the area. The shock wave can be jumped.

58520.name: Frozen Missile
58520.description: The fraenir tracks a target, then fires a frozen missile that deals damage and launches the enemies it hits.

58546.name: Death Wind
58546.description: The boneskinner spews a noxious cloud, launching enemies and applying torment. Extinguishes torches.

58638.name: Ghostly Arrow
58638.description: The Voice fires an arrow that bounces between nearby targets.

58647.name: Ice Flail
58647.description: The icebrood construct swings its arm, doing damage and knocking enemies down. Breaks free any Bound Ice Elementals that are hit.

58694.name: Frostbite Aura
58694.description: Icebrood construct pulses a volatile aura that deals damage every 3 seconds to all foes within a range of 2,000.

58736.name: Unnatural Aura
58736.description: The boneskinner pulses a volatile aura that deals damage every 3 seconds to all foes within a range of 2,000.

58740.name: Ice Shock Wave
58740.description: The icebrood construct slams its arm down, doing damage and creating a shock wave that knocks enemies down. The shock wave can be jumped.

58809.name: Douse in Darkness
58809.description: Pulls enemies towards the center of the room. Extinguishes torches.

58811.name: Icequake
58811.description: The fraenir slams into the ground creating a shock wave that knocks enemies down and explodes any ice blocks it contacts. The shock wave can be jumped.

58861.name: Tormenting Aura
58861.description: Does damage every second. Damage increased per stack.

58886.name: Snowball
58886.description: Throws an expertly packed snowball. Ouch.

58954.name: Aurora Beam
58954.description: Targets the farthest player with a beam of continuous icy doom.

59029.name: Mist Bomb
59029.description: Mist essence explodes on impact, damaging and burning nearby creatures.

59059.name: Ice Drop
59059.description: Targets an area, leaving behind a damaging ice combo field.

59078.name: Ice Shatter
59078.description: The Whisper of Jormag covers the ground with volatile ice magic that deals periodic damage.

59096.name: Ice Shatter
59096.description: The Whisper of Jormag covers the ground with volatile ice magic that deals periodic damage.

59101.name: Noxious Wind
59101.description: Swipes forward, creating a cascading wind that knocks back targets.

59102.name: Spreading Ice
59102.description: The Whisper of Jormag targets all enemies with deadly ice shards. While a target may evade their own shards, they may not evade others' shards.

59147.name: Ice Shatter
59147.description: The icebrood construct shatters a piece of its core, creating ice platforms that shoot multiple ice projectiles. Once the projectiles stop, the platform becomes safe to stand on.

59158.description: The Whisper of Jormag covers the ground with volatile ice magic that deals periodic damage.

59159.name: Chains of Frost
59159.description: The chain of frost between the Whisper of Jormag and one of its foes deals damage to those who touch it.

59192.name: Falling Ice

59202.description: The Whisper of Jormag pulses a volatile aura that deals damage every 3 seconds to all foes.

59213.name: Frigid Vortex
59213.description: A vortex of freezing cold air surrounds you, periodically dealing massive damage.

59236.name: Smash

59255.description: The Whisper of Jormag summons deadly ice tornadoes.

59288.name: Falling Ice

59347.description: Leap finisher that leaps to the target, slamming down with massive force.

59391.name: Spiral Strike
59391.description: Spins around, damaging and knocking back nearby enemies, and sending out a volley of bolts.

59425.description: The Whisper of Jormag covers the ground with volatile ice magic that deals periodic damage.

59441.description: The Whisper of Jormag targets a foe with a massive burst of frost magic. The damage done by this attack is distributed among all enemies caught in the blast.

59450.name: Vortex of Hail
59450.description: Summons icy spheres that orbit the caster.

59455.name: Falling Ice

59489.description: The Whisper of Jormag covers the ground with volatile ice magic that deals periodic damage.

59554.description:
Meld with your other pet. 
This counts as swapping pets.

59562.description: Your first attack explodes, dealing extra damage to nearby enemies.

59591.description: Charge up and release a burst of torment energy on nearby foes.
